unnormalised: Okay, mhonnllear konnem tor mhakka tailoring-chea mapanche vixim vicharlem. Mhaka dislem, mhaka tailoring-ichi wat suru zali jevna mhaka mazyakurta-k length-achi goroz asli. Dekh, hanv sumar 5 ft 10 in asa, ani standard kurtas sodanch thodde lahan asle. Maka sodanch awkard dislem, tuka khobor asa? Mhonnun, hanven decide kelem tailoring-che vixim thodem shikunk. Mazy Nani, ti sewing machine-acher bhov hushar asli, tinnem mhaka basics shikoyle.
normalised: Borem, maka konnem thaikamachea mapavixin vicharle. Mhaje thaikamachea prayanak survat zali jevhan maka mazy kurtak ek khas lambai zai asli. Dekh, hanv sumar panch fut dhah inchacho asa, ani sadharan kurte hamesha khupe dhakate astat. Maka hamesha ajibat barem disanaslem, tumak mahit asa? Mhunn hanvem thaikamavixin thodde shikonk tharaylem. Mazi Nani, ti sewing machine-ant khupe hushar asli, tinem maka mull tatvam shikoylim.

unnormalised: Tinnem mhaka "shoulder width"-i sarkhea vostunchi mahatv sangli – samanya mhaka 18 inches asta, ani "sleeve length" – ti mhaka sumar 25 cm shoulder-achea thavn dovrunk zai. Magir asta "chest measurement," samanya 40 inches, aramdayak fit-ak mahatvache. He map barabor mellop khup mahatvachem. Maka ugddas asa jevna hanvem poilen shirt korunk prayatn kelem, hanvem collar completely bigdhoilem! Ekak 3 cm motta zallem. Mottem chuken.
normalised: Tinem "khandeanchi rundai" – sadharanpanan mazak sumar athra inch asta, ani "bahi lambai" – je hanv sumar panchvis centimeter khandyakun sandhtalim tanche mahatv sangilem. Magir "chatiche map" asta, sadharanpanan challis inch, bareak bosunk mahatvachem. He map sarkheponan ghevop khub mahatvachem. Maka athavta jevhan hanvem poilech faut shirt korpak prayatn kelo, hanvem collar purnpane bhair kelo! Eka bazun sumar tin centimeter vaddo astalo. Moti chuk.

unnormalised: Atam, hanv confidently fabric "meters"-an order korunk sakta ani tailor-ak specific adjustments magunk sakta. Ani, map samajhta mhunnun prices-anche vixim discuss korunk ui upyogi zata. Tuka exact "gsm" (grams per square meter) fabric-ache mahit asa zalear, tu local market-an bhawn-bharav korunk shakta. Atam, mahiti mellop ani ankdden vichar korunk mahatvacha. Mhaka viswas asa, thodem tailoring-achem gyan ek lambi wat dakhoita!
normalised: Atam, hanv visvasan "meters"-ant kapodd order korunk xakta ani tailor-ak khas badlop korpak sangonk xakta. Ani, mapank samajop darpan chukchopakui madad korta. Visvas dhorat, thodde thaikamachem gyan dukan zata!
